thread.title: Stylish Items to Splurge On in 2017 Fashion
thread.title_full: Stylish Items to Splurge On in 2017 | POPSUGAR Fashion

author: Sarah Wasilak
title: Stylish Items to Splurge On in 2017 Fashion
text:
Don't lie to yourself: there are certain fashion items you've been eyeing for ages. We've got respect for your willpower, but you deserve to treat yourself every once in a while. We're not suggesting you shell out the cash for everything on the list ahead, but why not consider gifting yourself with a style reward?
Nothing here is a wardrobe basic or any type of necessity, but there's no denying a new piece of artwork or a well-made coat will put a big, goofy smile on your face. Read on to shop — we promise you the investment is worth it.
Related:
14 Fashion Splurges Worth Every Penny
12 Style Resolutions to Make If You're an Introvert
Don't Feel Guilty Spending Money on These Undergarments — They're Worth It
